comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: This photo is featured in a post on the Smithsonian Institution Archives' blog, THE BIGGER PICTURE.

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: It might be of interest that there were sheep there for a time, but look at the composition....most of the sheep are facing away from the camera.  Another poor photo.  And how can you call Woodrow Wilson a subject of this photo?  Where is he in the photo?
